info.headline: She saved the world with CSS!

points.topic: Worked on Hilary Clinton's website for the recent campaign.
Compared the job to a 18-month, nationally televised hackathon.
Created a pattern libray called Pantsuit.
Technical Debt is your friend.  You have to make strategic decisions to deliver on time knowing that you will have to refactor. Let it go!
Used a methodology of define, implement, test, iterate.
Unfortunately, had a ton of assholes try to take her down because of their own shortcomings.
Crashed the Clinton campaign website during a speech. Was one of the most challenging experiences of her life.
Pantsuit was never open sourced because people on redditt were actively trying to impersonate the site to discredit Clinton.
In the end she would do it all over again. It made for a life changing experience and made a enormous social impact.
